text: Pooja Sharma is an Indian model and actress. She appeared in serial Mahabharat on Star Plus. ==Biography== Sharma was born in Delhi, India. She plays the role of Draupadi in mythological venture Mahabharat. ==Family== Sharma came from a Delhi-based educated family. She said "I am here because of my family. They have always supported me when it comes to acting and seeing me on screen. My brother is very critical about my work and on the other hand my mom and sister-in-law love my work. The journey in Mahabharat is very beautiful. I have actually fallen in love with Draupadi's and my work." ==Career== Sharma started her career with modeling. She has also done anchoring, hosting and daily ads. After that she got selected for the role of Draupadi. ==Sources== ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:1982 births Category:Indian actors Category:People from Delhi
title: Pooja Sharma
